item.description: <p>Interestingly, Steve Vai released a compilation album which featured the seventh track from each of his previous releases:</p><p><a href="<a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000051YBF"" rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000051YBF"</a>><a href="http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000051YBF" rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000051YBF</a></a></p>
